abstract: Ms. Abramson, a former executive editor of The New York Times, and the journalist Steven Brill are said to be in talks with Arianna Huffington.
snippet: Ms. Abramson, a former executive editor of The New York Times, and the journalist Steven Brill are said to be in talks with Arianna Huffington.
lead_paragraph: Jill Abramson, a former executive editor of The New York Times, and the journalist Steven Brill are in talks with The Huffington Post to host a new journalism site that would run long articles monthly and pay writers advances of up to $100,000, according to people briefed on the discussions.

headline.main: Huffington Post Is Said to Be in Talks to Host a Jill Abramson Journalism Start-Up
headline.print_headline: Former Times Editor May Create News Start-Up at Huffington Post

byline.original: By Ravi Somaiya and David Carr
